attributes.action: Solar power for Housing assosications and Council tenants
attributes.additional_details: A great way to lower carbon emissions and make England a more greener place to live I recommend the idea that Housing assosications and councils try turning houses and flats into greener energy. this would lower peoples electric bills and be much better for the enviroment. with the prices of electricity going up this seems the only way we can keep the prices more affordable and making England cleaner.
